rules_text:
Menace
Noncreature artifacts you control have “Grand evolution X–{X}. Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.” [i]({X}: If that artifact isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature. Put X +1/+1 counters on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
